SYLLABUS

MODULE SPECIFICATION

Target Audience Public Health Professionals
Learning Hours 10 hours
Module Developer RITM-Antimicrobial Resistance Surveillance Reference Laboratory

WORSHOP OBJECTIVES

The conduct of this workshop aims to:

CONTENT OVERVIEW

  • Discussion on the steps of ARSRL SaTScan and Whole Genome Sequencing enhanced outbreak investigation protocol.

  • Discussion on the role of WGS in public health and outbreak investigation.

  • Discussion on the overview of the following digital epidemiology tools: Epicollect5, Pathogenwatch and Microreact.

  • Hands-on activities on the use of Epicollect5, Pathogenwatch and Microreact.

LEARNING OUTCOMES

After this workshop, the participants are expected to:

ASSESSMENT OF LEARNING OUTCOMES

A written pre-test and post-test shall be administered before and after the training. All participants will be provided with a worksheet that will include formative assessment activities for each of the five learning outcomes of the workshop.

WORKSHOP FLOW DIAGRAM

HOW THIS MODULE WORKS?

OUTLOOK

Provides the learning outcomes for each module unit.

LESSON PROPER

Provides an overview of the topic or description of features of the digital epidemiology tools

CLOCK-UP

Indicates the step-by-step guide of the hands-on activities during workshop.

BRAINWORK

Shows the summary of important concepts for each digital epidemiology tool.

SNAPSHOT

Indicates the summary of important concepts for each digital epidemiology tool.

FLICK

List of journal articles and additional reference on the use of the featured tools.

CHECKPOINT

This section includes as formative test.
